abstract: What do you know how to do well, no matter how seemingly-insignificant or offbeat? Is there something you could teach others not to do? What, among your many skills, would be most fun to make a video about?

headline.main: Student Question | What Skill Could You Teach in Two Minutes?

snippet: What do you know how to do well, no matter how seemingly-insignificant or offbeat? Is there something you could teach others not to do? What, among your many skills, would be most fun to make a video about?
